subtitle: Did a student deliver an old paper as his own only to find out it was written by his professor?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A student belonging to a fraternity who keeps a file of member papers and examinations is carved through a pile and chooses a paper that is several years old for reproduction and resubmission. And when he gets his paper back from the professor, it includes "A" and his suspension, "when I wrote this paper as a freshman who only got "C," and I always thought it deserved more."
